name: Gravity Shift (Cheeming-Bepis)
description:
Gravity Shift is a game about dodging falling platforms in front of you, a spinoff of Gravity Swift, before Gravity Swift 2 Releases

How to play: Platforms fall off the sky, swift has to dodge them, use your mouse to rotate him so he does not get crushed, once you get the hang of it, try hard mode to unlock things like elite mode.

____________________________________

Inspired by Super Hexagon, Luxor Evolved(Design) and Death Run 3D
